# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a map size that represents an empty area on a two-dimensional projection of a map.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a map size

- **init(width:height:)**: Creates a map size that represents an area on a two-dimensional projection of a map with the specified width and height.

items.description: Creates a map size that represents an area on a two-dimensional projection of a map with the specified width and height.
items.name: init(width:height:)
